name: Lost Bitcoin Layer
description: A story that suggests Bitcoin, as we know it, is only half of Satoshi's vision. The other half? ATOM. It was erased. Buried in commented-out code. Lost before Bitcoin's public release. And yet, their fingerprints remain. I rebuilt first Bitcoin commit with ATOM and launched THIS web wallet interface. So you can experience history firsthand! Mine Bitcoin and earn ATOMS just like in Satoshi's first code. I also recreated the marketplace and ratings system exactly as Satoshi envisioned. All the proof is on this page. To bring maximum attention to this OG meta, I launched a meme token [ATOM] Lost Bitcoin Layer on PumpFun - Yeah, it’s a crappy idea, but I don’t know another way to quickly draw your attention.
